sentence.Network_en: He plays some passages so slowly that they become lugubrious.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些段落他演奏得异常徐缓，听上去有些忧伤。

sentence.Network_en: That long, lugubrious howl rose on the night air again!
sentence.Network_cn: 夜空中又传来了那又长又凄凉的狗叫声.

sentence.Network_en: This ingredient does not invite or generally produce lugubrious lamentation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一要素并不引起,或者说通常不产生故作悲伤的叹息.

list.abs: ...冠鱼狗（学名：Megaceryle lugubris）为翠鸟科大鱼狗属的鸟类。该物种的模式产地在日本。冠鱼狗原属于鱼狗属（Ceryle），但按照DNA数据，改分到大鱼狗属。鱼狗属下只剩下斑鱼狗一种。en Moyle, Robert G. (.
...白肩笔螺（学名：Nebularia lugubris），是新腹足目笔螺科圆笔螺属的一种。主要分布于台湾，常栖息在潮间带岩礁。cite web|url=http://shell.sinica.edu.tw/chinese/shellbase_detail.php?science_no=3390|title=国.
...哀鳞趾虎（学名：Lepidodactylus lugubris）为壁虎科鳞趾虎属的爬行动物。分布于斯里兰卡、印度、东南亚、印澳群岛、澳大利亚、太平洋岛屿、巴拿马、哥伦比亚西海岸、台湾岛等地。该物种的模式产地在南太平洋塔希提岛。== 参考文献 ==<br.
...阔步鰺（学名：Caranx lugubris），又称黑鰺、甘仔鱼，为辐鳍鱼纲鲈形目鲈亚目鰺科的其中一个种。==分布==本鱼广泛分布于全球各大洋之热带及亚热带海域。==深度==水深12至135公尺。==特徵==本.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin lugubris (from lugere 'mourn') + -ous

entry.def: If you say that someone or something is lugubrious, you mean that they are sad rather than lively or cheerful.

example.ex: ...a tall, thin man with a long and lugubrious face...
example.tran: 一张长脸、面色悲戚的瘦高男子

example.ex: He plays some passages so slowly that they become lugubrious.
example.tran: 有些段落他演奏得异常徐缓,听上去有些忧伤。

auth_sentence.content: The usual pained expression on her long lugubrious face.

auth_sentence.content: Aunt Leah was the cheerful one while Aunt Rosina...was lugubrious and suffered from indigestion.
